name: Theta
description: Double-jointed arm that focuses on reliably scoring on cubes and cones.  Winner of Arizona East Regional Competition.

name: Lockdown
description: The only robot in FRC history to go undefeated in official play.

name: Phantom
description: Two-stage cascade rigging telescoping arm capable of scoring on all three levels.

name: La Cucaracha
description: Small 25x25 frame with over 100 3D printed parts with ropeless elevater that uses tiny belts and chain.

name: Trident
description: Sideways elevator with pick up abilities from the ground and human player station.

name: Jesko
description: Telescoping arm that takes a handoff from ground pickup on robot.

name: Whiplash
description: Unique octogonal drive train that can shoot cones and cubes accurately to their nodes.

name: Doffle
description: One of the only robots in FRC made primarily out of carbon fiber.  3 game piece and engaged in autonomous.

name: Tai Lung
description: Arm driven off an 80:1 gear ratio with a intake + carriage weight of only 16 lbs.

name: Dexter
description: Double-jointed arm that is can place cones on all 3 levels and ground intake accurately shoots cubes on the move.

name: Genome Xi
description: Large double-jointed arm designed for reliable scoring.

name: Hertz
description: Coaxial arm adds to robistness, efficiency, and simplicity.
